page.title: 11Businesses Around Ufton.
page.content: There are three established businesses in the area around Ufton: 1. The Fox And Hen Public House 2. Grestones Boarding Kennels 3. Stoneythorpe Riding Stables The Fox and Hen at Bascote Heath draws customers from surrounding towns. The trade is very seasonal because of its isolated position.It may have to serve food in order to survive, especially in winter. Summer trade is good and a special feature is a fort- nightly jazz evening. The boarding kennels takes dogs,cats and rabbits. It is a recent venture for a redundant couple from Birmingham who also breed dogs. The riding stables is on the A425 and attracts customers from a wide area. It is still a working farm.
